title: PBE APPLYING PATCHES STUCK AT 39%
body: I got stucked at 39% applying patches on PBE!! What can i do?

replies.body: Your connection might be struggling to grab updates, so it's back tracking and failing.  Run through our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to make sure there's no snags along the way of downloading these files.
